dct_description_sm: Geological Institue of the Russian Academy of Sciences. Geological Survey of Israel. Companion text: Tectonics / Vladimir G. Kazmin. Geological framework of the Levant. Volume I: Cyprus and Syria / Valerie A. Krqasheninnikov; John K. Hall; Francis Hirsch; Chaim Benjamini. Jerusalem: Historical Productions-Hall. 2005. 463-498 p. Article is chapter 8. North Decimal Degree 37.3333. South Decimal Degree 32.300. East Decimal Degree 42.4167. West Decimal Degree 35.700. Map is plate III. Mercator projection, Pulkovo 1942 datum. It was done and georeferenced using Global Mapper (ver. 6.08) and then texturized with the 90 m. topography of Syria and environs from the Shuttle Radar Topographic Mission. Verso: Geomorphologicam map of Syria.
